response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This price not only ensures a fair deal for both of us but also allows me to maintain a reasonable profit margin. I understand this might be higher than what you were expecting, but considering the quality and benefits it offers, I believe it's a fair offer. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you'd like to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
